0: I was lucky enough to be presented with the chefs ‘ taster plate ’ for his new seafood platter it ’s a must

To Sumi at the lobby lounge for pampering us with drinks and great service Gustu for remembering I like mangosteens and ordering them for me again the next day at breakfast Nanik for her personal touch at the Eight degree restaurant where we had such a wonderful dinner and special mention to Rajendra for calling me to remind me to attend the drinks reception when we were late
The breakfast buffet has a wide variety of dishes from many countries and it is a joy to enjoy the Koi pond while eating
The restaurant staff was awesome they came running with milk and ice cream calmed her down and was so apologetic even after we explained it was our fault for not paying attention

The ale carte selection was also delicious and freshly made and the drinks selection was such a joyThe amenities were fantastic for our family especially our 25 year old son who enjoyed the pool with the sand which was a better option for sand play compared to the beach which was a stones throw away
breakfast pastries are insanely good magical evening swims
This is a very good hotel superb in location many restaurants nearby
Staying in a suite we had the option of the exclusive pool with polside day bed with bar service

There is a fantastic restaurant nearby to the entrances of the Conrad Suites called Bumbu Bali we discovered this on our penultimate evening and we wish we had gone there sooner fantastic food and cultural experience
When we checked in we were informed that breakfast was included
1: Breakfast at Suku was decent spread was pretty okay but was not much I wanted to eat that is probably on me
Luckily there are a number of restaurants and other resorts near by

Good gesture but overall still left us with a frustrating bad experience of our final days in Bali so not happy overal We found the breakfast average compared to other Conrad properties we have stayed at in the past and also for Bali average having spent time at other 5 resorts
The lobby staff was helpful and Chereful not the restaurant staff through
Tri in particular runs a smooth and pleasant ship in the restaurant he and his staff hit just the right balance between happily attending to your meal without interrupting the flow of conversation
2: If the option is available take the 12 board Breakfast Buffet as part of the hotel package
The hotel was under renovation and there was lots going on it so that meant limited access to normal pool and restaurants etc

We had an ok stay if one wanted to fix a couple of things we would make the entrance reception space grander for a better first impression and warm up the water in the pools a couple of degrees felt too cold to get into comfortablyIt will not be long when the renovations are completed and the hotel will certainly be a lot nicer then due to access to the big pools and additional restaurants
But however it was not indicated that 23 of the hotel were closed and basically the complete pool area including restaurants and bars
The buffet was extensive and there were also some made to order items that one can request from the menu
Staff provided conflicting information as to which restaurants were open or closed conflicting info on the location of activities as well as the price of those activities
Event they serve menu if I do not want buffet
Dinner place is open for public for start from 300 K per pax
But indian restaurant Queens is just couple of steps away
